issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
For partitioned table operations, a Table WriteEntity is being added to the list to be authorized if there is a partition in the output list from semantic analyzer. 
However, it is being added with a default WriteType of DDL_NO_TASK.
The new Table WriteEntity should be created with the WriteType of the partition WriteEntity.
fields.summary: Inherit writetype from partition WriteEntity for table WriteEntity
